DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective is to determine the safety and maximum tolerated dose (MTD) of Genasense administered as a 2-hour intravenous infusion once weekly (Part 1) and twice weekly (Part 2) to patients with solid tumors.
DOC.brief_title: Genasense as a 2-hour Intravenous Infusion in Subjects With Solid Tumors
